name: Develop Project Charter
summary: Document objectives, high-level scope, risks, and authority to start.

name: Identify Stakeholders
summary: Identify everyone involved or affected and analyze their interest and influence.

name: Develop Project Management Plan
summary: Consolidate all subsidiary plans into a comprehensive master plan.

name: Plan Scope Management
summary: Define how scope will be planned, tracked, and validated.

name: Collect Requirements
summary: Determine and document stakeholder needs and requirements.

name: Define Scope
summary: Develop a detailed description of the project and product.

name: Create WBS
summary: Subdivide deliverables into smaller, manageable components.

name: Plan Schedule Management
summary: Establish policies for planning, developing, and controlling the schedule.

name: Define Activities
summary: Identify specific actions required to produce deliverables.

name: Sequence Activities
summary: Identify and document relationships (dependencies) among activities.

name: Estimate Activity Durations
summary: Estimate the number of work periods needed to complete activities.

name: Develop Schedule
summary: Analyze sequences, durations, and resources to create the schedule model.

name: Plan Cost Management
summary: Define how costs will be estimated, budgeted, managed, and controlled.

name: Estimate Costs
summary: Develop an approximation of the monetary resources needed for work.

name: Determine Budget
summary: Aggregate estimated costs to establish an authorized cost baseline.

name: Plan Quality Management
summary: Identify quality requirements and standards and how to demonstrate compliance.

name: Plan Resource Management
summary: Define how to estimate, acquire, manage, and use physical and team resources.

name: Estimate Activity Resources
summary: Estimate team resources and materials required for project work.

name: Plan Communications Management
summary: Develop an approach for information exchange based on stakeholder needs.

name: Plan Risk Management
summary: Define how to conduct risk management activities.

name: Identify Risks
summary: Identify individual project risks and sources of overall risk.

name: Perform Qualitative Risk Analysis
summary: Prioritize risks by assessing their probability of occurrence and impact.

name: Perform Quantitative Risk Analysis
summary: Numerically analyze the combined effect of identified risks on objectives.

name: Plan Risk Responses
summary: Develop options and actions to enhance opportunities and reduce threats.

name: Plan Procurement Management
summary: Document procurement decisions, specify the approach, and identify sellers.

name: Plan Stakeholder Engagement
summary: Develop approaches to involve stakeholders based on their needs and impact.

name: Direct and Manage Project Work
summary: Lead and perform the work defined in the plan to achieve objectives.

name: Manage Project Knowledge
summary: Use existing knowledge and create new knowledge to achieve objectives.

name: Manage Quality
summary: Translate the quality management plan into executable quality activities.

name: Acquire Resources
summary: Obtain team members, facilities, equipment, and materials needed.

name: Develop Team
summary: Improve competencies, team interaction, and the overall team environment.

name: Manage Team
summary: Track performance, provide feedback, resolve issues, and manage team changes.

name: Manage Communications
summary: Ensure timely and appropriate collection, creation, and distribution of info.

name: Implement Risk Responses
summary: Implement agreed-upon risk response plans.

name: Conduct Procurements
summary: Obtain seller responses, select a seller, and award a contract.

name: Manage Stakeholder Engagement
summary: Communicate with stakeholders to meet needs and address issues.

name: Monitor and Control Project Work
summary: Track, review, and report overall progress to meet performance objectives.

name: Perform Integrated Change Control
summary: Review all change requests, approve changes, and manage changes.

name: Validate Scope
summary: Formalize acceptance of the completed project deliverables.

name: Control Scope
summary: Monitor the status of scope and manage changes to the scope baseline.

name: Control Schedule
summary: Monitor the status of the project schedule and manage changes.

name: Control Costs
summary: Monitor the status of costs and manage changes to the cost baseline.

name: Control Quality
summary: Monitor and record results of quality activities to assess performance.

name: Control Resources
summary: Ensure resources are available as planned and monitor utilization.

name: Monitor Communications
summary: Ensure information needs of the project and stakeholders are met.

name: Monitor Risks
summary: Monitor implementation of risk plans and identify new risks.

name: Control Procurements
summary: Manage procurement relationships and monitor contract performance.

name: Monitor Stakeholder Engagement
summary: Monitor stakeholder relationships and tailor strategies for engagement.

name: Close Project or Phase
summary: Finalize all activities across all groups to formally close the project.
